Package roomservice

Class OrderManager

java.lang.Object
roomservice.OrderManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
main.FileIO.ReadWrite
public class OrderManager extends Object implements main.FileIO.ReadWrite
Manages functionalities regarding the orders and menu items
Author:
Bach Nguyen
